Introduction
This topic contains information about the impact of the fire at the NPRC on claims processing, including
records destroyed in the fire at NPRC
requesting reconstruction of a Veteran’s medical records
action to take when a claimant fails to return a completed
NA Form 13055
,
Request for Information Needed to Reconstruct Medical Data
handling negative replies to Personnel Information Exchange System (PIES) requests submitted under request code M05-V
requesting reconstruction of a Veteran’s military service records
action to take when a claimant fails to return a completed
NA Form 13075
,
Questionnaire About Military Service
handling negative replies to PIES requests submitted under request code S02-V
completing a formal finding when attempts to verify service are unsuccessful
, and
completing a formal finding on evidence of service in the absence of other official documentation
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F - Fire-Related Records, Supplementary or Substitute Records, and Records for Unique Situations
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F
